templates.template: <xf:textboxrow name="options[merchant_id]" value="{$profile.options.merchant_id}" label="{{ phrase('fs_coin_pal_merchant_id') }}" explain="{{ phrase('fs_coin_pal_merchant_id_explain') }}" required="required" /> <xf:textboxrow name="options[secret_key]" value="{$profile.options.secret_key}" label="{{ phrase('fs_coin_pal_secret_key') }}" explain="{{ phrase('fs_coin_pal_secret_key_explain') }}" required="required" />
